value: Let's dive in with a code sample
Which of the following is/are true?

value.1: List can be defined using square brackets.
value.2: Values in [] are elements of list
value.3: List can contain any number of elements

correct.value: We define lists in square brackets with elements separated by commas and it can contain any number of elements.

incorrect.value: We define lists in square brackets with elements separated by commas and it can contain any number of elements.
